title: Requires charges for telephone calls based on duration, whether over lines or by cellular, to be charged and prorated by the second basis
summary: Requires charges for telephone calls based on duration, whether over lines or by cellular, to be charged and prorated by the second; applies to all service providers; authorizes the public service commission to promulgate rules and regulations.
